accessGroups.label: Access groups
accessGroups.description: Groups with access to the dataset.

checksumAlgorithm.label: Checksum algorithm
checksumAlgorithm.description: Algorithm for computing checksums of files. The default is a good choice for most cases.

contactEmail.label: Contact email
contactEmail.description: Email address of the person to contact about the dataset.

creationLocation.label: Creation location
creationLocation.description: Identifier for the place where data was taken, usually of the form 'site:facility:instrument'.

description.label: Description
description.description: Free text explanation of the contents of the dataset.

endTime.label: End
endTime.description: End time of data acquisition for the dataset.

instrumentId.label: Instrument
instrumentId.description: The instrument where the data was taken.

isPublished.label: Published
isPublished.description: Check to make the dataset publicly available immediately.

keywords.label: Keywords
keywords.description: Tags associated with the dataset for search and categorization. Values should ideally come from defined vocabularies, taxonomies, ontologies or knowledge graphs.

license.label: License
license.description: Name of the license under which the data can be used.

owners.label: Owners
owners.description: People who own the dataset and its data. The owners typically have full access to the data and decide who can use it and how.

ownerGroup.label: Owner group
ownerGroup.description: The group that owns the dataset in SciCat and the data on disk. As uploader, you need to be a member of this group.

proposalId.label: Proposal
proposalId.description: The proposal, if any, under which this data was recorded or computed.

relationships.label: Relationships
relationships.description: Relationships with other datasets. In particular the 'input' relationship indicates datasets that were processed to obtain the dataset you are uploading.

runNumber.label: Run number
runNumber.description: Facility or instrument run number that this data belongs to.

sampleId.label: Sample ID
sampleId.description: SciCat identifier for the sample that was used to record the data.

scientificMetadata.label: Scientific metadata
scientificMetadata.description: Arbitrary metadata describing the dataset. Choose what to include based on how you want to search for and identify the dataset later. The unit can be omitted if it does not apply.

sourceFolder.label: Source folder
sourceFolder.description: Absolute file path on the file server for a folder where the data files will be uploaded.

startTime.label: Start
startTime.description: Start time of data acquisition for the dataset.

techniques.label: Techniques
techniques.description: Techniques (experimental, analysis) used to produce the dataset.

type.label: Type
type.description: Characterize the type of the dataset.

usedSoftware.label: Used software
usedSoftware.description: Software used to produce the dataset.
